result.arabic_text: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَأَنۡهَٰرٗا وَسُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ
result.translation: Yarashinze n’imisozi mw’isi kugira iyigumye, ntibazungagize; Ibashiriraho n’inzuzi mwikorako, Ibacira n’inzira mucamwo kugira ntimuzimire inzira ibashikana aho mwipfuza kuja;
